2164.subject: CART
2164.descrlong: This course offers an introduction to the techniques, history and cultural significance of animation. Students will explore, demonstrate, and apply basic skills in traditional (cell/stop motion) and digital animation techniques. The course also covers basic pre-production, production and distribution skills, as well as collaborative projects. Incoming students are expected to be comfortable with drawing, working in groups, and  to be familiar with basic digital media tools.  (Credit/ No Credit Available)
